name: BeyondJob.com
overview:
BeyondJob - The social networking platform for working professionals - has two main goals:

  1. We want to help you get the scoop on what’s great - and not so great - about your current and past employers.

At BeyondJob, you can search for salary, company and recruiter reviews in your area. We provide you with an easy-to-use interface, where you can quickly look up information such as employer rankings, management style and fun polls. You can also sort through our vast data base, to find a review according to a particular company, sector or industry. This is turn, helps you zero in on your next employer or recruiting firm. We are dedicated to making your job search easier and more efficient. After all, what good are job-posting sites, if you don’t know the truth about your next employer or recruiter?

  1. We want to empower you with the best ways of looking for a new job online:

Unlike online job posting boards, BeyondJob does not try to sell you anything. It’s free to use! In return, we ask you to tell us - your fellow members - the whole story. We want to hear about your good experiences and your bad ones. So, be sure to include all relevant facts and details.

After reading this, you may ask: Why not just email friends or ask them in person? BeyondJob stands out from traditional word of mouth:

By creating an easy and fun way for real professionals to share opinions on the employers they are working for or have worked for. By fostering a vibrant community of job seekers and professionals who feel connected both on BeyondJob and, in the real business world. And, by connecting insightful reviews to the actual human beings who wrote them - what we call Real Employees, Real Reviews.
